p: The homozygous HOM-2 cell line expresses HLA-DR B1*0101 chains. Both IEDB and NetMHCpan algorithms predicted high affinity binding to this HLA-DR chain for the six peptides included in the nested set of CHIKV E3 ligands identified by mass spectrometry ( Table 1). The CHIKV E1 240-249 peptide showed more moderate affinity values with both bioinformatics tools ( Table 1).
